= Setting OpenPilot to communicate with MinimOSD =

To use the MinimOSD at CC3D or Revo you have to configure the following things:

FlexiPort: GPS
MainPort: Telemetry
RecvPort: choose whatever you are using

http://minoposd.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/HWsettingsGPSTelemetry.jpg

For using the GPS you have to enable GPS under OptionalModules

http://minoposd.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/HWsettingsOptionalModules.jpg

Double check if the AttitudeActual Flight Telemetry Update Period is 100ms

http://minoposd.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/AttitudeActual.jpg

To have a faster response to your RC-RX input you have to change the ManualControlCommand Flight Telemetry Update Period from 2000ms to 500ms

http://minoposd.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/ManualControlCommand.jpg

When you have to configure your GPS you can temporarily configure ComBridge, but don't forget to change it back as shown in the first picture

http://minoposd.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/HWsettingsComBridge.jpg
